A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi shatters expectations at every turn. Some CGI felt a bit weightless like in the prequels\, but this ultimately has no effect on the truly subversive story. I questioned some choices halfway through\, but every one of those choices either pays off or sets up Episode IX in a very interesting way. This film is simultaneously the most Star Wars and the least Star Wars\, which some see as a fault. I\, however\, think it's exactly what Star Wars needs.
